mapper.sql: Acc_ID, Time_Find, Car_Num, Hurt_Num, Loc_Sheng, Loc_Shi, Loc_Xian, Loc_Detail, People_Num, Gov_CJ, Gov_LR, Time_Police, Time_Invest, Fire_Tru, Time_FireTru, Ambulance, Time_Ambu, State, Status, id,Time_Insert
mapper.select: SELECT Acc_ID, Time_Find, Car_Num, Hurt_Num, Loc_Shi, Loc_Xian, Loc_Detail, People_Num, Gov_CJ, Gov_LR, Time_Police, Time_Invest, Fire_Tru, Time_FireTru, Ambulance, Time_Ambu, State, id,Loc_Sheng ,status,Time_Insert FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} order by Time_Insert desc limit #{start},#{size}

SELECT Acc_ID, Time_Find, Car_Num, Hurt_Num, Loc_Shi, Loc_Xian, Loc_Detail, People_Num, Gov_CJ, Gov_LR, Time_Police, Time_Invest, Fire_Tru, Time_FireTru, Ambulance, Time_Ambu, State, id,Loc_Sheng ,status,Time_Insert FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} and YEARWEEK( date_format( Time_Insert,'%Y-%m-%d' ),1 ) = YEARWEEK( now(),1 ) order by Time_Invest desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} and YEARWEEK( date_format( Time_Insert,'%Y-%m-%d' ),1 ) = YEARWEEK( now(),1 ) ;
SELECT count(*) FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} ;
SELECT status FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} and DATEDIFF(Time_Insert,NOW())= #{diff};
select status from a11_baseinfo where id = #{id}
select status from a11_baseinfo where id = #{id} and Time_Insert >= date(now())
SELECT status FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} and YEARWEEK( date_format( Time_Insert,'%Y-%m-%d' ),1 ) = YEARWEEK( now(),1 ) ;
SELECT status FROM a11_baseinfo WHERE id = #{id} and DATE_FORMAT( Time_Insert, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) ,'%Y%m' ) ;
select count(*) as countRes from a11_baseinfo where Time_Insert >= date(now())

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from a11_baseinfo
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into a11_baseinfo (Acc_ID, Time_Find, Car_Num, Hurt_Num, Loc_Sheng, Loc_Shi, Loc_Xian, Loc_Detail, People_Num, Gov_CJ, Gov_LR, Time_Police, Time_Invest, Fire_Tru, Time_FireTru, Ambulance, Time_Ambu, State, Status,id,Time_Insert) values (#{accId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeFind,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{hurtNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{locSheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locShi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locXian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peopleNum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{govCj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{govLr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timePolice,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeInvest,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fireTru,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeFiretru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ambulance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeAmbu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{id,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{timeInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update a11_baseinfo
Time_Find = #{timeFind,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Car_Num = #{carNum,jdbcType=TINYINT},
Hurt_Num = #{hurtNum,jdbcType=TINYINT},
Loc_Sheng = #{locSheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Loc_Shi = #{locShi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Loc_Xian = #{locXian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Loc_Detail = #{locDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
People_Num = #{peopleNum,jdbcType=TINYINT},
Gov_CJ = #{govCj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Gov_LR = #{govLr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Time_Police = #{timePolice,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Time_Invest = #{timeInvest,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Fire_Tru = #{fireTru,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Time_FireTru = #{timeFiretru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Ambulance = #{ambulance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Time_Ambu = #{timeAmbu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{id,jdbcType=TINYINT},
Time_Insert = #{timeInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where Acc_ID = #{accId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
